alert.note: Alert for Dickson; Houston; Humphreys; Montgomery (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 2:53PM CST until December 09 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Dickson County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Houston County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Humphreys County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 345 PM CST. * At 252 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waverly, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dickson, Waverly, Erin, White Bluff, McEwen, Charlotte, Vanleer, Slayden, Cheatham Dam, and Cunningham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
